template: An oddly satisfying, 8K hyper-realistic, seamless loop video for social media. A [CAMERA_ANGLE] of [SUBJECT] being [ACTION] by a [INTERACTING_TOOL]. The scene is set against a clean, minimalist background and lit by soft, diffused studio lighting that accentuates every hyper-detailed texture. The color scheme is a visually pleasing [COLOR_PALETTE]. The motion is smooth, deliberate, and hypnotic, repeating in a perfect, mesmerizing 8-second loop. The overall aesthetic is clean, ASMR-focused, and incredibly satisfying. Audio: The primary sound is a crisp, high-fidelity [PRIMARY_SOUND_EFFECT], with a background of [AMBIENT_SOUND].

variable_explanations.[CAMERA_ANGLE]: Specifies the camera's perspective. Examples: 'extreme close-up macro shot', 'top-down flat lay shot', '45-degree angle shot', 'slowly rotating shot'.
variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: The main object or substance being manipulated. Examples: 'a block of rainbow kinetic sand', 'a pool of thick, glossy paint', 'perfectly arranged dominoes', 'a sheet of honeycomb'.
variable_explanations.[ACTION]: The satisfying action being performed on the subject. Examples: 'perfectly sliced', 'smoothly spread', 'crushed in slow motion', 'endlessly drizzled'.
variable_explanations.[INTERACTING_TOOL]: The tool or force causing the action. Examples: 'a hot knife', 'a palette knife', 'a hydraulic press', 'a mechanical arm'.
variable_explanations.[COLOR_PALETTE]: Defines the overall color scheme of the video. Examples: 'vibrant pastel rainbow', 'monochromatic shades of blue', 'warm sunset gradients', 'bold neon colors'.
variable_explanations.[PRIMARY_SOUND_EFFECT]: The dominant, crisp ASMR sound that syncs with the action. Examples: 'a crisp, granular slicing sound', 'a soft, wet squishing noise', 'a clean, metallic click', 'a deep, viscous bubble pop'.
variable_explanations.[AMBIENT_SOUND]: The subtle background sound or silence that completes the audio experience. Examples: 'complete studio silence', 'a faint, low hum', 'subtle room tone', 'a soft, ethereal synth pad'.

examples.prompt: An oddly satisfying, 8K hyper-realistic, seamless loop video for social media. A Macro close-up of A perfect sphere of honeycomb being drizzled by a stream of golden honey. The scene is set against a clean, minimalist background and lit by soft, diffused studio lighting that accentuates every hyper-detailed texture. The color scheme is a visually pleasing Amber and warm gold tones. The motion is smooth, deliberate, and hypnotic, repeating in a perfect, mesmerizing 8-second loop. The overall aesthetic is clean, ASMR-focused, and incredibly satisfying. Audio: The primary sound is a crisp, high-fidelity thick, viscous dripping sound, with a background of a gentle, low hum.

examples.prompt: An oddly satisfying, 8K hyper-realistic, seamless loop video for social media. A Close-up on the tip of A sheet of thick watercolor paper being painted by a calligraphy brush loaded with blue ink. The scene is set against a clean, minimalist background and lit by soft, diffused studio lighting that accentuates every hyper-detailed texture. The color scheme is a visually pleasing Deep indigo and crisp white. The motion is smooth, deliberate, and hypnotic, repeating in a perfect, mesmerizing 8-second loop. The overall aesthetic is clean, ASMR-focused, and incredibly satisfying. Audio: The primary sound is a crisp, high-fidelity the gentle, wet drag of a brush on paper, with a background of the quiet ambiance of an artist's studio.

tips: For the best looping effect, choose simple, repetitive actions. Avoid complex movements that are difficult to loop seamlessly.
Use strong, descriptive words for textures (e.g., 'glossy', 'granular', 'viscous') to guide the AI's visual interpretation.
The combination of [PRIMARY_SOUND_EFFECT] and [AMBIENT_SOUND] is crucial. A crisp main sound with a silent or very subtle background often works best for the ASMR effect.
Experiment with 'slow motion' in the [ACTION] variable to enhance the satisfying feel of the movement.
Specify the aspect ratio (e.g., '9:16 for TikTok') directly in the prompt if you have a specific platform in mind, though Veo's metadata settings also handle this.
description: Generate viral-worthy 'Oddly Satisfying' video loops for TikTok and Instagram with this expert-level Veo 3.1 prompt. This template is engineered to create mesmerizing, seamless loops with a focus on hyper-detailed textures, clean aesthetics, and high-fidelity ASMR audio. Perfect for content creators, marketers, and anyone looking to produce captivating short-form video content that hooks viewers and boosts engagement. Customize everything from the subject and action to the color palette and sound design to create endless variations of satisfying content.
instructions:
1. Copy the prompt template.
2. Choose one of the 7 variables to customize, such as `[SUBJECT]`.
3. Refer to the `variables_explanation` section for ideas and examples for each variable.
4. Replace the placeholder `[SUBJECT]` with your desired subject (e.g., 'a perfectly ripe avocado').
5. Continue to replace the other variables (`[ACTION]`, `[INTERACTING_TOOL]`, `[COLOR_PALETTE]`, etc.) to build your unique scene.
6. Ensure your chosen `[PRIMARY_SOUND_EFFECT]` directly relates to the `[ACTION]` for a convincing ASMR experience.
7. Paste the completed prompt into Veo 3.1.
8. Ensure your Veo settings match the 'prompt_metadata' (8 seconds, audio on, etc.) for optimal results.
9. Generate your video and enjoy the mesmerizing, viral-ready content!

suggestions: Consider: vintage, surreal, playful, whimsical, mysterious
Add: poster, design, scene, texture, pattern

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: EXCELLENT. The title 'Cinematic Portrait of [Subject] Poster Art' perfectly adheres to the required structure ([Descriptor] + [Subject] + [Type]). It is concise (6 words), uses strong visual descriptors ('Cinematic,' 'Poster Art'), and leaves no ambiguity regarding the expected output format.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: EXCELLENT. The template is robust and highly specialized. The subject variable is clearly marked. Core style descriptors constitute a robust 40% of the prompt and utilize advanced terminology (volumetric lighting, harsh chiaroscuro). The inclusion of specific technical camera specifications (ARRI Alexa 65, 75mm lens, f/1.4) and the correct aspect ratio (`--ar 2:3`) ensures maximum output quality consistent with the 'Poster Art' promise.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: EXCELLENT. Nine highly diverse examples were provided, meeting the minimum quantity requirement. The examples successfully span multiple genres (sci-fi, fantasy, noir, historical, abstract concepts) demonstrating the prompt's versatility and range. The mix of specific characters (grizzled hacker) and abstract concepts (benevolent AI entity) is ideal.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: EXCELLENT. The use cases (film pitch decks, book covers, concept art) are clearly defined, targeting a professional user base seeking high-fidelity, production-ready assets. The unique value proposition—focusing specifically on professional, cinematic lighting and camera specs—elevates this above standard portrait prompts. A premium price tier is justified.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: EXCELLENT. The description opens with a compelling hook ('Tired of flat images?') and immediately establishes the high quality of the output ('industry-standard cinematic poster art'). It clearly lists the key technical features (chiaroscuro lighting, professional camera specs) and specifies the target audience (concept artists, indie filmmakers). All requirements met.

priority_improvements: None. This package is exemplary and marketplace-ready.
Suggestion for future expansion: Consider creating an advanced bundle that includes lighting variant presets (e.g., 'Neon Noir Cinematic,' 'Desert Sun Cinematic').

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.

commercial_description:
Instantly generate hypnotic, 'oddly satisfying' video loops that captivate any audience.

•   **Flawless Visual Consistency:** The prompt automatically maintains a polished, cohesive aesthetic, ensuring every loop feels like part of a professional series.
•   **Cinematic Lighting, Instantly:** Generate videos with perfect, hyper-realistic lighting and textures with a single command—no complex adjustments required.
•   **Infinite Subject Versatility:** Magically transform any concept, from abstract shapes to everyday objects, into a mesmerizing visual masterpiece.

Perfect for captivating social media posts, engaging ad creatives, stunning website backgrounds, and unique digital art projects.

Simply copy, paste, and watch the magic happen.
